title: Real Housewife Margaret Josephs, Ultimate Betrayals and Reconciliations
description:
Hollywood couples sometimes reconcile! Colton Underwood is engaged, gay, and happy. Kimora Lee Simmons was one time with the ultimate financial and love swindler. Shanna Moakler escaped an abusive boyfriend. Then RHONJ Margaret Josephs gets into marital affairs, hypocrites, Teresa’s fiancé's response to his viral video, and who's dating who in New Jersey. We also discuss part 1 of RHOSLC and why Heather Dubrow of RHOC is mad at Margaret. Lastly, we cast Girls Trip 3 and what real housewives should join Margaret. 

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free

Or get access to Extra Juicy on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop
